com.google.thingbrowser.api
Class AbstractThing

java.lang.Object
  com.google.thingbrowser.api.AbstractThing
All Implemented Interfaces:
Thing
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractImageFilterThing, AbstractMimeThing, ComposedMovieThing, Stickies, Sticky
public abstract class AbstractThing
extends java.lang.Object
implements Thing

A simple abstract implementation of Thing.

Subclasses of this class must supply a URL upon construction, and should call setter methods (such as setDisplayName(String)) to set other important information and keep it up to date.
